quick_wins.title: Add discriminated union example to WebSocket message types
quick_wins.description: Enhance the WebSocket message types documentation with a clear example of how to use discriminated unions for type-safe message handling
quick_wins.patch_sketch: Add a comprehensive example showing how to properly use discriminated unions with Zod schemas for WebSocket message handling, demonstrating type narrowing and exhaustive checking patterns.

quick_wins.title: Improve WebSocket serialization error handling
quick_wins.description: Add more comprehensive error handling around the safe_serialize_message function to catch and log serialization issues
quick_wins.patch_sketch: Wrap the orjson serialization in additional try/except blocks to catch specific serialization errors and log them with more context before falling back to the generic error handler.

quick_wins.title: Add cache key validation utility
quick_wins.description: Create a utility function to validate cache keys before use to prevent injection-like issues
quick_wins.patch_sketch: Implement a validation function that checks cache keys against a whitelist of allowed characters and patterns, and integrate it into the cache access functions.

quick_wins.title: Enhance TypeScript type definitions for feature flags
quick_wins.description: Improve the TypeScript type definitions for feature flags to provide better autocomplete and type safety
quick_wins.patch_sketch: Create a comprehensive type definition file with strict typing for all feature flags, using discriminated unions where appropriate and adding JSDoc comments for better IDE support.

quick_wins.title: Add safe accessor patterns for nested objects
quick_wins.description: Implement safe accessor functions for deeply nested objects to prevent runtime errors
quick_wins.patch_sketch: Create utility functions that safely access nested object properties with optional chaining and default value support, reducing the risk of runtime errors from undefined property access.

quick_wins.title: Improve error messages in hierarchy resolver
quick_wins.description: Enhance error messages in the optimized hierarchy resolver to provide more context for debugging
quick_wins.patch_sketch: Add more descriptive error messages that include relevant context like entity IDs, path information, and operation types when hierarchy resolution fails.

quick_wins.title: Add validation for RSS route processor configurations
quick_wins.description: Implement configuration validation for RSS route processors to catch misconfigurations early
quick_wins.patch_sketch: Add a validation method that checks processor configurations for required fields and valid values when processors are initialized, providing clear error messages for invalid configurations.

quick_wins.title: Enhance logging in anti-crawler manager
quick_wins.description: Improve logging in the anti-crawler manager to provide better visibility into domain-specific backoff strategies
quick_wins.patch_sketch: Add structured logging that captures domain information, backoff states, success rates, and strategy changes to help with debugging and monitoring of the anti-crawler system.

quick_wins.title: Add type safety to geospatial layer configurations
quick_wins.description: Improve TypeScript type definitions for geospatial layer configurations to prevent runtime errors
quick_wins.patch_sketch: Create comprehensive TypeScript interfaces for all geospatial layer configurations with strict typing and validation schemas to catch configuration errors at compile time.

quick_wins.title: Improve documentation for LTREE materialized view refresh
quick_wins.description: Enhance documentation for the LTREE materialized view refresh process with clearer examples and explanations
quick_wins.patch_sketch: Add detailed examples of when and how to call refresh_materialized_view(), clarify the performance implications, and provide troubleshooting guidance for common refresh issues.

quick_wins.title: Add connection pool health check endpoint
quick_wins.description: Create a health check endpoint that reports on database connection pool status and utilization
quick_wins.patch_sketch: Implement an endpoint that exposes connection pool metrics like current usage, available connections, and health status to aid in monitoring and debugging connection issues.

quick_wins.title: Enhance WebSocket message batching documentation
quick_wins.description: Improve documentation for WebSocket message batching strategies with concrete implementation examples
quick_wins.patch_sketch: Add detailed examples of how to implement server-side debouncing, client-side batching, and diff-based updates to reduce WebSocket traffic and improve performance.
